creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Three-panel huipil; side panels are a plain white ground; central panel is predominantly patterned; red weft-face background; rows of geometric forms alternate with human and animal figures in multiple colors; magenta appliqué encircles neck with embroidered patterns.
medium: Cotton, silk; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning, appliqué, and embroidery
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
